text: Qadirabad railway station () is a disused railway station on the Karachi–Peshawar Railway Line located in Punjab, Pakistan. The station is located east of Yusafwala railway station and west of Okara Cantonment railway station. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Sahiwal District Category:Defunct railway stations in Pakistan Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Qadirabad railway station
